author: The Irish Times
title: Leading Northern Ireland lawyer in critical condition because of coronavirus
description: Niall Murphy in hospital since last week
content:
By David Young, PA
One of Northern Irelands most well-known solicitors is in a critical condition in hospital with coronavirus, his law firm has said.
Niall Murphy, 43, has been involved in many high-profile criminal trials and civil court cases, often repr… [+2108 chars]
